title: The Bunnyhop, Episode 8: Alice Barnes, Elena Cecchini, and Paris-Roubaix
content:
The Bunnyhop, Episode 8: Alice Barnes, Elena Cecchini, and Paris-Roubaix

In Episode 8 of The Bunnyhop powered by Cannondale, Rebecca Charlton is joined by Meg Backstedt and Josie Nelson (Coop-Hitec) in the studio to chat about the first women’s Paris-Roubaix and the 2021 edition of the Women’s Tour.

Rebecca meets up with Alice Barnes for a ride around Manchester and we learn something new about Elena Cecchini in “Something About Me”.

Read More
author: Abby Mickey
